revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Coronet South |image = [[File:Mt. Coronet South.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Coronet South. |tokens = 60,500 |location = North of Route 208, the absolute bottom of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Mt. Coronet South''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 651,500 |- | Machoke (Boss) || 3,000,000 |- | Bronzong (Boss) || 3,000,000 |- | Absol (Boss) || 3,000,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Clefairy (x2) * Zubat * Machop * Geodude * Nosepass * Meditite * Chingling * Bronzor * Magikarp * Barboach * Noctowl * Machoke (boss) * Bronzong (boss) * Absol (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 33% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
